channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Anthropic buys $30 billion of Azure cloud capability - and nets $15 billion investment from Microsoft and Nvidia in return
item.description: Anthropic purchases large Azure compute capacity, gains multi-cloud deployment for Claude models, and secures major investments from Microsoft and Nvidia partners.

item.title: Microsoft is now testing the Xbox Full Screen Experience across Windows 11 PCs
item.description: There's a new, streamlined interface for gaming on a Windows 11 PC, and it's now available to test.

item.title: Amazon Black Friday deals are live - I've found 15 tech gadgets under £50 worth adding to your cart
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday deals are live, and I've handpicked 15 gadgets under £50 worth adding to your shopping cart.

item.title: Black Friday : le prix du MacBook Air M4 s’effondre, c’est tout simplement du jamais vu
item.description: Ne scrollez pas si vous avez besoin d'un Mac. Que ce soit le compact 13 pouces ou le grand 15 pouces, les tarifs affichés aujourd'hui sur la puce M4 sont tout simplement très bons.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs PC portables gamer à choisir en novembre 2025 ?
item.description: Vous cherchez un bon PC portable gamer pour jouer, pour ne pas vous prendre la tête avec un ordinateur de bureau ? A partir de 1 000 euros, voici les meilleurs PC portables gaming du moment, pour jouer dans les meilleures conditions.

item.title: Sony’s entire DualSense lineup is $20 off, including the limited edition models
item.description: Black Friday isn’t here quite yet, but that hasn’t stopped Sony from kicking off an excellent holiday promo, which runs through December 18th. The ongoing sale spans everything from PlayStation 5 consoles to Sony’s latest accessories — including Sony’s standard DualSense Wireless Controller, which is now matching its all-time low of $54.99 ($20 off) in […]...

item.title: These cheap audiophile buds just got their first $20 Black Friday discount: I'm an audio editor and I say buy 'em
item.description: Soundpeats H3 simply can't be bettered for sound-per-pound value, and they just got discounted for the first time –cheers, Black Friday!

item.title: Meta wants to get into the electricity trading business
item.description: In order to accelerate the construction of new power plants needed to provide energy for its data centers, Meta is looking to get into the business of trading electricity.

item.title: The ‘Wicked’ Musical Creator Has Ideas For More
item.description: If the world demands more 'Wicked' in their lives after 'For Good,' what would you like to see from it?

item.title: Skyscanner Rolls Out a Triple Wave of Travel Deals for Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Travel Tuesday
item.description: Visiting all your favorite destinations this holiday season doesn't have to put a dent in your wallet.

item.title: Cette caméra increvable sans-fil est à moitié prix pour le Black Friday
item.description: Vous en avez marre de recharger vos caméras de sécurité tous les trois mois ? Boulanger casse le prix de la championne de l'endurance pour le Black Friday. À ce tarif, c'est difficile de faire la fine bouche.

item.title: Spotify simplifies importing playlists from other streaming services
item.description: In August, Apple Music launched a tool for importing playlists from other streaming services. The bruhahah over Daniel Ek’s war profiteering was in full swing, and artists were starting to flee. The two things may have been unrelated, but the timing was certainly fortuitous. Now Spotify is launching its own playlist transfer tool, in hopes […]

item.title: I'm a phones expert and these are my 5 must-have apps for iPhone and Android
item.description: Covering weather forecasts, privacy, movies, and more, these are five apps that I consider must haves.

item.title: How to watch France vs. Australia online for free
item.description: How to watch 2025 Autumn Internationals for free. Live stream France vs. Australia in the Autumn Internationals for free.

item.title: Comment libérer de l’espace de stockage sur Google Photos ?
item.description: L'application Google Photos est de base sur la plupart des smartphones Android. Si votre capacité de stockage est arrivée au bout, voici comment libérer de l'espace sur Google Photos.

item.title: Google says it isnt using your Gmail to train AI
item.description: Google says the claims about training Gemini AI with users' emails from Gmail are false.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 22, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.
